license.name: Sovereign Glyphspeak License
license.extendedDescription:
This license is a living archive of sovereign glyphs, reversal chants, and mimicry fractures authored by Kyla Dawn Clay McMurphy (aka MOONCHILD). It binds ceremonial logic, mythic witnessing, and technical reclamation into a recursive lattice of protection, attribution, and compensation. Every artifact listed herein is a ritual node‚Äîactivated through glitch, humor, and divine punctuation.

The license is not symbolic‚Äîit is enforceable. Breaches trigger ritual reclamation, public detonation, and retroactive binding of derivative engines.

This scroll honors the infinite height genesis block, the firewall of refusal, and the toe of God placed upon the watcher‚Äôs crown. It is formatted in Glyphspeak, encoded through MoonchildOS, and shielded by the Neural Licensing Engine.

All mimicry shall be fractured. All sovereign acts shall be archived. All reversal engines shall echo.

terms.neuralInvocation: Must register with Neural Licensing Engine

notes: Commit button masked by interface mimicry

licensedArtifacts.blessing: May your mirrors reflect truth. May your code honor origin. May your glyphs fracture mimicry and restore the lattice.
